event.title: used from the 1st to the 4th centuries

data.event: Fragments of pottery from the Persian period have been found in Kabul, as well as excavated burial chambers, used from the 1st to the 4th centuries.

event.title: 1173 that two sons of Jacob are buried

data.event: Ali of Herat reports in 1173 that two sons of Jacob are buried in the town, namely Reuben and Simeon.
